tool_description: Trestle's Reverse Phone API validates a phone number and provides phone metadata, owner name and demographics, current and historical addresses, relatives and associated people, and additional phone numbers. Typical use cases for this API include caller identification, call routing, lead assessment, lead prioritization, and lead append.
title: Reverse Phone API

api_list.name: getPhone
api_list.description: Reverse Phone API validates a phone number and provides phone metadata, owner name and demographics, current and historical addresses, relatives and associated people, and additional phone numbers.
